website_summaries.verdict: Living up to its name, this skirt is intended to keep you dry during light duty kayaking typical of inland waters.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to slip on the kayak (which I definitely can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Took it for a workout on my Heritage 9.5 Featherlite kayak a couple times this last weekend. Worked very well for recreational yakking with a little touch of whitewater splashes thrown in. Easy to slip on the kayak (which I definitely can't say for a lot of skirts on kayaks I've used over the years. Fit the Featherlite perfectly. Stayed up on my torso. Comfortable. The only extremely minor item of gripe is common with all lower end recreational kayak skirts I've used; water pools up a little on the skirt. No real problems as the material didn't leak at all and I could raise my knees to knock the pools off as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: not flexible enough to be effective
customer_reviews.text: This is basically the same material as a Weber Grill cover. Very stiff. Draw string. I've used a neoprene spray skirt on a sea kayak and that was great. This beast, however, was not going on. If it did go on, it would be very noticeable and uncomfortable -- like wearing a canvas tarp. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: IowaBill

customer_reviews.title: I love this, kept me mostly dry
customer_reviews.text: When I tipped briefly a little too much water came in.. I was only below water line maybe a fraction of a second during a deep carving turn, a little water came in.. Just noticeable because it was winter and a little bit of a shock from the cold. This isn't designed for whitewater anyway and is not really expected to be waterproof. But this price cannot be beat for the quality this product is. Fits my Dagger Stratos 14.5L very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonhide

customer_reviews.title: Fun for mild
customer_reviews.text: Love this skirt, but if you float a plastic boat, rolls are not going to happen for you. The website doesnt go unto detail about this, but does state that plastic doesnt allow the skirt to grip properly. In mild to moderate water, this skirt works just fine to keep the interior dry (drier).
customer_reviews.author: Diogenes

customer_reviews.title: Great spray skirt at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The spray skirt fit the cockpit of my kayak as advertised. It was easy to install and effective at keeping the water out during normal river use. I haven't been out on the ocean, but I think it might be a bit light if one rolls in heavy surf.
customer_reviews.author: Lester A. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to put on and take off. I used it for 3 hours today.
customer_reviews.author: Christine H.

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly and works as a light duty spray skirt
customer_reviews.text: For light duty situations it is perfect. Fit my wife's Liquidlogic kayak great and kept her dry from some drizzle and splash on our paddles last weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Olszewski

customer_reviews.title: This spray skirt is waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This skirt met my expectations. They only complaint is that it doesn't have a bow in front of the tunnel to keep from getting puddles of water that always land on it when paddling.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and good quality. Sheds water and keep you dry.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I use it all the time and I will be purchasing another on efor my other kayak as well.
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: Worthy tool for kayak
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely, covers well, waiting to use it with rougher waters.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerkindle  customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove like it a lot reasonable price well made what can I say except ggggggreat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for Necky Manitou
customer_reviews.text: Great skirt...great fit for my Necky Manitou...if it had a small pocket of some sort it would be perfect...
customer_reviews.author: Sally J.

customer_reviews.title: 1.2 Does NOT fit ORU kayak
customer_reviews.text: 1.2 Does NOT fit ORU kayak. Consider the next size 1.4
customer_reviews.author: CopperDude

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Fits Point 65N Martini snugly and seems to be waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Shelley R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent construction! Well made! Unfortunately it does not fit my kayak. HAPPYJACK
customer_reviews.author: happyjack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when scheduled and fits perfectly. Can not wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the size of these are to vague would not fit my Kayak sent back
customer_reviews.author: Brice

customer_reviews.title: i have a 40in waist and it fit good.
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what it's supposed to do, i have a 40in waist and it fit good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made, fits kayak. make sure you go to manuf to order correct size before purchasing
customer_reviews.author: candy

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit if ya a big guy or gal
customer_reviews.text: Fits my kayack like a glove. But the waste is very tight idk maybe I need to loose weight. Im a 38 waist. Ware it below the waste its comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ken brose

product_meta.title: Seals Inlander Spray Skirt
product_meta.description: The Seals Inlander Nylon sprayskirt is designed for light to moderate paddling conditions with today's recreational kayaks in mind. Made with Medium-weight coated nylon packcloth that is durable and water resistant. . Adjustable tunnel for comfort and it. Rim grip/safety slip technology keeps the skirt on your cockpit rim. Double-stitched and sealed seams (except Camo). Use the Seals kayak database to determine your best size. http://www.sealsskirts.com/sizing/sizing.php.
